title: Best of The Herd for Apr 22, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Apr 22, 2020
description:
Gronk will make Brady feel more comfortable and make the Bucs a real contender

The Patriots are collecting draft picks to get a QB

Joe Burrow won't be great and Colin uses facts to prove it

Roger Goodell is smart and refuses to speculate about September

The 49ers question Jimmy Jimmy Garoppolo's judgement and that's why they explored getting Brady

Guest: Joel Klatt, FOX Sports College Football and NFL Draft Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
